text: Þis is Alfwoldes bisceopes cwyde, þæt is ðæt he geann þæs landes æt Sandforda in to þam mynstre in to Crydian tune him to saulsceatte mid mete & mid mannum swa hit stent butan witeþeowum mannum.
& anes hiwscypes he geann Godrice þærof & an sylhðe oxna.

& he geann his hlaforde feower horsa, twa gesadelode & twa unsadelode, & feower scyldas & IIII spera & twegen helmas & twa byrnan & L mancsa goldes þe Ælfnoþ him sceal æt Wudeleage & ænne scegð LXIIII ære.
He is eall gearo butan þam hanon he hine wolde ful gearwian his hlaforde to gerisnum gif him God uðe.
& Ordulfe twegra boca, Hrabanum & martyrlogium.
& þam æþelingeXLmancsa goldes & þæra wildra worfa æt Æscburnan lande & twegra getelda.
& Alfwolde munuceXXmancsa goldes & anes horses & anes geteldes.
& Byrhtmære preosteXXmancsa goldes & anes horses.
& his þrim magon Eadwolde & Æþelnoðe & Grimkytele hira ælconXXmancsa goldes & hira ælcon anes horses.
& Wulfgare his mæge twegra wahryfta & twegra setlhrægla & þreo byrnan.
& Godrice his aðume twegra byrnena.
& Eadwine mæssepreoste V mancsa goldes & his kæppan.
& Leofsige mæssepreoste þæs mannes þe he him ær tolet Wunstan hatte.
& kenwolde helm & byrnan & Boian anes horses & MælpatrikeVmancsa goldes & Leofwine PolganVmancsa goldes & Ælfgare writere an pund penega.
He lænde Tune & his geswysternon, gehealdon hi hine.

& Eadgyfe his swyster an strichrægl &Ihrigchrægl &Isethrægl & Ælflæde offestranVmancsa penega & SpilanIIImancsa goldes &LXpenega & Leofwine Polgan & Mælpatrike & Byrhsige hira þreora ælcon an hors & ælcon hiredmen his onrid þe he alæned hæfde.
& his hiredcnihton eallonVpund to gedale ælcon be þam þe his mæð wære.
& in to Crydian tune þreo þeningbec mæsseboc & bletsungboc & pistelboc & an mæssereaf.
& on ælcon bisceophame ælcon men freot þe witeþeow wære oðþe he mid his feo gebohte.
& in to Wiltune calic & disc onCXXmancsa goldes butan þrim mancsa.
& burþenon his beddreaf.
& þises is to gewitnesse, Wulfgar Ælfgares sunu & Godric be Crydian & Eadwine mæssepreost & Alfwold munuc & Byrhtmær preost.
